Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: "Dear Selena, I've got good news!", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "The play I've been writing has an important breakthrough.", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It happened... because I've obtained more information about you.", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Records from the abandoned space station.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>Chairman Allen had a long struggle with the Parliament in order to conduct an investigation and data collection on the space station.<para\\>I've never seen him looking this serious…", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The squad that eventually landed there retrieved the remains of the lost Archaeological Team.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'One of their memory banks miraculously preserved an audio file.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It was your voice in that file.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I heard... the chat you two had, and your song.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '...', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Truth is, it took me a while to collect myself before writing this letter.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm sorry, but I can't recall how I felt when I first heard it as I'm writing this.", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I felt... hurt, and helpless, and... angry. I can see them on Chairman Allen's face as well, who allowed me to listen to the clip.", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'For a moment, I almost felt like you were there with me.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Sure... That was pleasant and naive. But perhaps that sweetness was what allowed me to write this story down.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Later in the audio clip, there was only one voice.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Your voice... you were talking to yourself.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'You told me that talking to oneself is an inevitable step in creation. Truth be told, that, too, was how I felt since I started writing.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "It is a peculiar experience. I thought I knew myself quite well, but as I started penning my characters' actions, I began to realize—", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'There are so many parts of me that I have yet to explore. The ways I wanted the world to develop as I wrote them down.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Do you... also talk to yourself when you write?', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Have you ever been convinced, accused, or saved by your inner self?', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'In the three years you slumbered in the space station... how many times... have you talked to yourself...', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Tell me, Selena.', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '—Yours, Ayla', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory528.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Flora', 3: '～Oh, blood and blades.～', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Flora', 3: "～An impressive battle it was, my brave comrades! But the fight is yet over, for our land is corrupted still, I'm afraid.～", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Flora', 3: '～So stand! Stand! Behind you your homeland you shall guard and defend!～', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Flora', 3: "～Stand! Stand! Skybound our home intends, stop us this bitter earth shan't!～", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl before them sings relentlessly, showered in the orange-tinted light.'}
{3: 'She looks so lively with the dusk focused on her like a spotlight, highlighting the only protagonist on this stage.'}

{3: "Only when Selena approaches closer that she realizes the girl's frail body is slightly shaking. Flora's arms show small signs of infection, which must be excruciating for a child. She is relying on her willpower to perform for an empty audience."}
{3: 'This is an underground theater. The subterranean design has slowed down its deterioration, and the hidden entrance has shielded it from Corrupted attacks. Even the stage is intact.'}
{3: "It also makes it difficult for those who search for it. Pieter followed the track to this place, only to be circling it outside, unable to pin down Flora's trail."}
{3: 'By the time Selena discovered the underground structure and found the entrance by analyzing the architecture in the surroundings, it was already dusk.'}
{3: 'Then she argued with Pieter for a while at the entrance.'}
{3: '—"If we take her back by force, she\'s just going to run away again in the future... Just give me a little time. A little is all I ask. Let me talk to her."'}
{3: 'She convinced Pieter to stay at the entrance, entering the theater by herself.'}
{3: "And she has been watching the first half of the girl's solo performance as the sole audience."}
{3: 'As the girl finishes a segment, Selena steps forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "～Oh, blood and blades. One by one you've sent my friends away.～", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena steps onto the stage, speaking the familiar lines. The very words that her younger self wrote.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '～My dearest brother, a brave solder, scars-covered. Before my eyes he fell, the battlefield his blood colored.～', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noticing an unexpected audience and co-performer, Flora looks ecstatic.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Flora', 3: '～Beside him, a noble officer, wounded and similar-fated, crawling to the one first erased. Above the blood-soaked man he lies, arms held, his lips pressing the scorched face.～', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Flora tries her best to control her excitement and stay in character, taking a step toward Selena.'}
